about_the_game:
1. overview
After work, head to the station near the last train. However, something is wrong. I get on the train thinking so. Beyond that, a crazy different world full of death, madman and monsters awaited. There was a girl who got lost in another world as well as wandering in another world. She manages to find a way out of her and return to her original world with her girl.
2. Game content
⑴ It is necessary to explore another world and find a means of escape while hiding yourself from madmen and monsters (in the grass, under a table, in a locker, etc.) or temporarily incapacitating with a gun.
⑵ The heroine girl has a good feeling. Increase her liking by having proper conversations and giving away recovery items and lost items.
⑶ If you eat or drink something from another world, the "Yomotsuhegui value" will accumulate, and if this accumulates above a certain level, you will not be able to return to the original world. This applies not only to players but also to heroines.
⑷ There are three difficulty levels, easy, normal, and hard, and the amount of recovery items recovered, the amount of ammunition obtained, and the heroine are different.
⑸ Heart items (5 for each difficulty level) for releasing the heroine's swimsuit costume are placed at various places on the stage.

content_descriptors.notes: This work contains grotesque and violent expressions such as defects in body parts.

detailed_description:
1. overview
After work, head to the station near the last train. However, something is wrong. I get on the train thinking so. Beyond that, a crazy different world full of death, madman and monsters awaited. There was a girl who got lost in another world as well as wandering in another world. She manages to find a way out of her and return to her original world with her girl.
2. Game content
⑴ It is necessary to explore another world and find a means of escape while hiding yourself from madmen and monsters (in the grass, under a table, in a locker, etc.) or temporarily incapacitating with a gun.
⑵ The heroine girl has a good feeling. Increase her liking by having proper conversations and giving away recovery items and lost items.
⑶ If you eat or drink something from another world, the "Yomotsuhegui value" will accumulate, and if this accumulates above a certain level, you will not be able to return to the original world. This applies not only to players but also to heroines.
⑷ There are three difficulty levels, easy, normal, and hard, and the amount of recovery items recovered, the amount of ammunition obtained, and the heroine are different.
⑸ Heart items (5 for each difficulty level) for releasing the heroine's swimsuit costume are placed at various places on the stage.
name: 狂の世界-Crazy World-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel(R)Core(TM)i5-3320M CPU @ 2.60GHz 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Conteúdo sexual
Atos criminosos

short_description: This work is a Japanese-style survival horror game. Operate the hero who got lost in another world and return to the heroine and her original world who also got lost in another world.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean
